metoro-mcp-server.command: <your path to Metoro MCP server go executable>/metoro-mcp-server

env.MT_TIME_SCALE: (Optional:Scale of travel time on real roads duration. default 4)
env.MT_REMBG_PATH: (absolute path of the installed rembg cli)
env.MT_PIXAI_MODEL_ID: (Optional: pixAi ModelId, if not set use default model 1648918127446573124
env.MT_COMFY_URL: (Option: Generate image using ComfyUI API at specified URL. Example: http://192.168.1.100:8188)
env.MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_T2I: (Optional: Path to API workflow file when using text to image with ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/t2i_sample.json)
env.MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_I2I: (Optional: Path of API workflow file when image to image in ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/i2i_sample.json)
env.MT_COMFY_PARAMS: (Optional: Variable values to send to the workflow via comfyUI API)
env.MT_FIXED_MODEL_PROMPT: (Optional: Fixed avatar generation prompt. You will no longer be able to change your avatar during conversations.)
env.MT_BODY_AREA_RATIO: (Optional: Acceptable avatar image area ratio. default 0.042)
env.MT_BODY_HW_RATIO: (Optional: Acceptable avatar image aspect ratios. default 1.5~2.3)
env.MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_W: (Optional: Avatar composite window horizontal ratio. default 0.5)
env.MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_H: (Optional: Avatar composite window aspect ratio. default 0.75)
env.MT_FILTER_TOOLS: (Optional: Directly filter the tools to be used. All are available if not specified. e.g. tips,set_traveler_location)
env.MT_MOVE_MODE: (Option: Specify whether the movement mode is realtime or skip. default realtime)
env.MT_NO_IMAGE: (Options: true = do not output image, not specified = output image if possible, default is not specified)
env.MT_FEED_TAG: (Optional: Specify the feed tag when posting to SNS (#required, 15 characters or more) Default is #geo_less_traveler)

args: GLOBAL_TOOL_PROMPT='Access to insights apis for ACME Financial Services abc.com .'
GLOBAL_TOOL_PROMPT='Access to insights apis for Healthcare API services efg.com .

@circleci/mcp-server-circleci: See the guide below for more information on using MCP servers with Claude Code:

args: path-to-project> \ Library \ PackageCache \ com.quaza.unitymcp@d2b8f1260bca \ mcpServer \ mcpServer \ build \ index.js

convex@latest: start  command should work. Please let us know in Discord if you run into any issues setting it up

env.MEMBASE_CONVERSATION_ID: your conversation id, should be unique

env.MCP_SETTINGS_PATH: path to your mcp settings file

env.ALGORAND_AGENT_WALLET: problem aim online jaguar upper oil flight stumble mystery aerobic toy avoid file tomato moment exclude witness guard lab opera crunch noodle dune abandon broccoli

args: c: \ path \ to \ folder \ starwind-ui-mcp \ dist \ server.js

snowflake.command: C: \ Users \ K \ anaconda3 \ envs \ regular310 \ python.exe

args: C: \ PATH \ TO \ PARENT \ FOLDER \ build \ index.js
